mapper.sql: id, formentryid, warehouseid, ftype, amount, opttime, operator,remark
mapper.select:
select r.id, r.formentryid, r.warehouseid, r.ftype, r.amount, r.opttime,u.name operator,r.remark,w.name warehousename from t_erp_purchase_form_receive r left join t_erp_warehouse w on r.warehouseid=w.id left join t_userinfo u on r.operator=u.id where formentryid = #{formentryid,jdbcType=CHAR}
and (r.ftype='in' or (r.ftype='clear' and r.amount>0))
and (r.ftype='out' or (r.ftype='clear' and r.amount<0))
order by r.opttime desc
